short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalist countdown timer discreetly tracking time in all your browser tabs in 15 minute intervals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your productivity and reclaim your time. The Minimalist Countdown Timer is a discreet tool designed for freelancers and self-employed professionals. 

By setting a clear end-of-day time, you can combat time blindness, maintain a healthy work-life balance, and prevent work from encroaching on your personal time.  

The timer sits discreetly in all your browser windows, in the corner of your choice, subtly updating every 15 minutes to show your remaining workday time. 

This keeps you aware of your schedule without disrupting your focus or flow or requiring constant reminders.
